languages.text: "Я... могу только надеяться. Молиться усердно, стараться быть добродетельной и упорно трудиться. И еще, быть может, если я смогу угодить Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}, то Император заметит это".
"I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."
languages.original_text: "Я... могу только надеяться. Молиться усердно, стараться быть добродетельной и упорно трудиться. И еще, быть может, если я смогу угодить Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}, то Император заметит это".

traits.locale_text: "I... can hope. Pray hard, try to be virtuous and diligent. And maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}?"
"I... can hope. Pray hard, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."
"I... can hope. Pray hard, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."
"I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."
"I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

languages.text: "Ich ... kann hoffen. Aufrichtig beten und versuchen, tugendhaft und fleißig zu sein. Und wenn es mir gelingt, {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} zufriedenzustellen, wird es der Imperator vielleicht erkennen."
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... kann hoffen. Aufrichtig beten und versuchen, tugendhaft und fleißig zu sein. Und wenn es mir gelingt, {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} zufriedenzustellen, wird es der Imperator vielleicht erkennen."

languages.text: « Je peux... espérer. Prier avec ferveur, m'efforcer d'être vertueuse et dévouée. Et si je parviens à satisfaire Votre Céleste Seigneurie, l'Empereur le remarquera peut-être. »
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux... espérer. Prier avec ferveur, m'efforcer d'être vertueuse et dévouée. Et si je parviens à satisfaire Votre Céleste Seigneurie, l'Empereur le remarquera peut-être. »

languages.text: “我可以……保持希望。我会虔诚地祈祷，保持勤劳，努力行善。如果我能让来自上界的大人感到欢心，或许，仅仅是或许，帝皇或许也会注意到我吧。”
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: “我可以……保持希望。我会虔诚地祈祷，保持勤劳，努力行善。如果我能让来自上界的大人感到欢心，或许，仅仅是或许，帝皇或许也会注意到我吧。”

languages.text: «Pues... con esperanza. Rezando con sinceridad, obrando con virtud y diligencia. Y, si consigo agradar a mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, tal vez el Emperador se fije».
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: «Pues... con esperanza. Rezando con sinceridad, obrando con virtud y diligencia. Y, si consigo agradar a mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, tal vez el Emperador se fije».

languages.text: 「私は…ただ、願うことしかできません。ひたすら祈り、高潔で勤勉であろうと努めています。そして、天の{mf|君|姫}を喜ばせることができれば、もしかすると、皇帝陛下が目を留めてくださるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…ただ、願うことしかできません。ひたすら祈り、高潔で勤勉であろうと努めています。そして、天の{mf|君|姫}を喜ばせることができれば、もしかすると、皇帝陛下が目を留めてくださるかもしれません」

languages.text: "Umut... Edebilirim. İçtenlikle dua eder, erdemli ve gayretli olmaya çalışırım. Eğer Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} memnun kalırsa o zaman belki İmparator'un dikkatini çekebilirim."
languages.original_text: "I... can hope. Pray earnestly, try to be virtuous and diligent. And if I manage to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, then maybe, just maybe, the Emperor will take notice."

traits.locale_text: "Umut... Edebilirim. İçtenlikle dua eder, erdemli ve gayretli olmaya çalışırım. Eğer Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} memnun kalırsa o zaman belki İmparator'un dikkatini çekebilirim."
